alert.note: Alert for Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 7:30PM EDT until July 17 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Warner River at Davisville. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Riverside Road floods along with increasing depths over recreational fields in Warner. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:01 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 8.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
